body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Gray Auto. My name is James Gray. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Ann. Can you please confirm your date of birth and home address for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my date of birth is zero six dash one two dash one nine eight zero, and my address is one two three Main Street, Anytown.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Ann. Now, could you tell me your email address and phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my email is ann.ramirez@example.com and my phone number is five five five dash one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for sharing that, Ann. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thank you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Ann. Thank you for contacting us. Have a wonderful day!
